channel.title: Midsection – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The MkIV is the most competitive option for transmasculine folx. Designed & iterated upon by an FTM during his pre-op days, this is the fourth version of the product.

We’ve replaced the previous material with a higher spandex-to-nylon ratio without sacrificing the compression of the original design. This medical grade Lycra® is softer to the touch than previous iterations for a longer wear-time.

For the best binder for your body, please make sure to follow the sizing instructions before ordering.

The post Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Light Maternity Support Belt
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Light Maternity Support Belt was designed to support mother and child during the first trimester. This form-fitting brace was designed to ease tension on the back by distributing the weight of the belly across the waist.

The post Light Maternity Support Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The Light Maternity Support Belt was designed to support mother and child during the first trimester. This form-fitting brace was designed to ease tension on the back by distributing the weight of the belly across the waist.

Adjustable tensions straps allow the belt to fit most sizes.

The post Light Maternity Support Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Cotton Gait Belt
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT Surgical Gait Belt / Transfer Belt is designed to be a heavy duty weight bearing belt that stays securely in place when fastened. Ensure a layer of clothing is between the patient’s skin and the belt to avoid abrasion. Keep resident as close as possible to caregiver during transfer. The proper way to apply it is to keep two fingers between the belt and the patient’s body. Tighten it until it has just enough room for your fingers. If the belt is too loose you could either have it slip upward and injure the patient’s chest (especially the female patient) or increase your risk for dropping them once the weight is put on the belt. A gait belt should never be used as a restraint or on patients with G-tubes and should be avoided with patients who have catheters.

The post Cotton Gait Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• A gait belt is a device used to transfer people from one position to another, from one thing to another or while ambulating people that have problems with balance
  • When to Use: Transferring residents who are partially dependent, have some weight-bearing capacity, and are cooperative. Transfers such as bed to chair, chair to chair, or chair to car; when repositioning residents in chairs; supporting residents during ambulation; and in some cases when guiding and controlling falls
  • The proper way to apply it is to keep two fingers between the belt and the patient’s body. Tighten it until it has just enough room for your fingers
  • Ensure a layer of clothing is between residents’ skin and the belt to avoid abrasion. Keep resident as close as possible to caregiver during transfer

The post Cotton Gait Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Tranz* Forms Full Length Top Binder
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The ultimate shape wear for flattening the chest, hips and abdominal regions. This sleeveless chest compression shirt features a full length fit, covering the torso down to the hips, which can be tucked in. Uses moisture wicking, high grade PowerNet compression fabric and a specially tailored fit for flattening power, the S-1000 features a double panel front and single panel back. The double panel front is designed to reduce and flatten the appearance of the chest and minimize curves. The single panel back allows for less compression and reduced strain on the back, providing greater flexibility &comfort. This is a discrete undergarment designed to be comfortably worn under clothing.

  • Made from Golden PowerNet, a moisture wicking, high grade medical compression fabric.
  • Double panel front for supporting total chest and abdomen control.
  • Single panel back reduces excess strain on the back muscles, allows more fabric breathability, and increases overall comfort
  • Covered seams at the neck and underarms to reduce chafing and skin irritation.
  • Sleeveless, tuckable chest compression tank with a full length fit, covering the full torso down to the bottom of the hips.

The post Tranz* Forms Full Length Top Binder appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Sizing

  1. Take a snug measurement under the bust line with a tape measure
  2. Next take another measurement over the fullest part of your chest
  3. Again not too tight but not too loose
  4. Add the two measurements and divide by two and you have your size!

S [28 in.- 31 in.] M [32 in. to 35 in.] L [36 in. to 39 in.] XL [40 in. to 43 in.] 2XL [44 in. to 47 in.] 3XL [48 in. to 51 in.]

The post Tranz* Forms Full Length Top Binder appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Velcro® Waist Incontinence Pants for adults are a unisex vinyl waterproof shell lined with brush polyester on the interior that slips over incontinence briefs, liners and pads or adult diapers. Great for those seeking solutions to manage incontinence. Incontinence pants act as a barrier that offer an added layer of protection from leaks or accidents, giving the wearer greater confidence and peace of mind.

The post Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• The elastic waistband, adjustable Velcro® closure means these are a snap to pull on
  • Elastic bands are covered with brush polyester to prevent irritation to sensitive skin
  • The generous fit makes these especially comfortable
  • Comes in White or Blue fabric
  • Durable, washable and reusable
  • Hang or lay flat – avoid heat exposure. Do not machine dry or iron

The post Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Universal Abdominal Binder | 9″ Tall / 3 Panels
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Model 219 Universal 9" Tall Abdominal Binder with 3 Panels provides moderate support and compression to abdominal muscles weakened by strain without restricting breathing or muscle redevelopment. Types of abdominal strains are defined as a mild injury to the abdominal muscles resulting from trauma, overuse, pregnancy, inactivity, or surgeries such as cesarean, liposuction, or hysterectomy.

The universal braces come in three sizes with a larger range in sizing than the alternative, giving the wearer greater versatility to find the best possible fit.

The post Universal Abdominal Binder | 9″ Tall / 3 Panels appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The Abdominal Binder is recommended for abdominal hernia reduction, postpartum recovery, bariatric support, and flattening and slimming of the abdomen. Conforms to body contour for support and proper compression, helping to speed recovery, increase circulation and reduce pain from movement or coughing.

  • Firmly holds dressings in proper position
  • Garment stays in place – won’t roll or chafe
  • Exclusive A-T Multiple Lock Stitch and high-quality fabric
  • Soft, breathable elastic (made of nylon, polyester and Lycra) ensures comfort, durability and consistent compression strength
  • Universal fit

About universal fit models:

If you aren’t sure what size you need and fall between measurements, the universal belt offers greater flexibility in accommodating a range of sizes. Rather than coming in 4 standard “true fit” sizes, our universal models come in 2 sizes (Small & Large) which are more generously cut to span across a wider range of sizes. For belts, wraps and binders, the universal model has a larger fastening panel for proper adjustment to achieve a customized fit.

Small: 30″ – 45″ | Large: 45″ – 60″ | XLarge: 60″ – 75″

The post Universal Abdominal Binder | 9″ Tall / 3 Panels appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Postpartum Maternity Belt With Microfiber Compression
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Our Postpartum Maternity Band with 6" Tall Microfiber Compression Panel provides the extra abdominal support and control new mothers need after giving birth. Medical grade compression helps support the abdominal and back muscles following childbirth, without restricting breathing or muscle redevelopment.

The Postpartum Maternity Band fits snugly around the belly, hips and waist and can easily be concealed under clothing. The binder features a heavy duty elastic compression fabric that is paired with a super soft 9" tall double layer PowerNet microfiber compression panel front, which helps to hold the skin tight as it returns to its original elasticity.

The post Postpartum Maternity Belt With Microfiber Compression appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• The Postpartum Maternity Band can be easily adjusted as your belly shrinks.
  • Made with a seamless moisture wicking microfiber double layer front panel using super soft medical grade PowerNet compression fabric, so that you feel comfortable and dry all day long.
  • Helps support weakened abdominal and back muscles following childbirth to aid in faster recovery and a quicker return to your pre-baby body.
  • Gently guards and helps protect an incision following a C-section while supporting the abdomen.
  • Made in the U.S.A. of top quality, durable, medical grade materials.

The post Postpartum Maternity Belt With Microfiber Compression appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Full Pregnancy Support Maternity Belt with Optional Strap
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This abdominal binder is designed to alleviate pregnancy induced lower back pain and discomfort by supporting the lumbar and abdominal regions with soft, flexible fabric to accommodate growth of your baby throughout your term. Wear discretely under your clothes, or over a tank top or cami for additional comfort.

The post Full Pregnancy Support Maternity Belt with Optional Strap appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Features an easily adjustable Velcro side strap that you can fit to your growing belly.
  • Two aluminum braces offer support and prevent slipping, keeping the belly band securely in place.
  • The belly band promotes correct posture and balance, allowing you to maintain your active lifestyle.
  • Alleviate backaches, promote correct posture and prevent stretch marks as your belly grows.
  • It also helps reduce the risk of stretch marks.

The post Full Pregnancy Support Maternity Belt with Optional Strap appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Cotton Transfer Belt in Different Colors & Patterns
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT Surgical Cotton Transfer Belt is constructed from heavy duty cotton webbing with a secure fastening metal buckle. Designed to be a heavy duty weight bearing belt and stays securely in place when fastened. Available in americana, featuring stripes of red and blue, as well as navy. Pink stripes are out of stock.

The standard belt is available multiple sizes at a lower price thanks to the plastic buckles.

The post Cotton Transfer Belt in Different Colors & Patterns appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Instructions

  • Transferring residents who are partially dependent, have some weight-bearing capacity, and are cooperative. Transfers such as bed to chair, chair to chair, or chair to car; when repositioning residents in chairs; supporting residents during ambulation; and in some cases when guiding and controlling falls.
  • The proper way to apply it is to keep two fingers between the belt and the patient’s body. Tighten it until it has just enough room for your fingers.
  • Ensure a layer of clothing is between residents’ skin and the belt to avoid abrasion. Keep resident as close as possible to caregiver during transfer.

The post Cotton Transfer Belt in Different Colors & Patterns appeared first on AT Surgical.
